com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common

Class ItemEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common.ItemEncoder

  • public class ItemEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides encoding of messages containing item data, in the forms of refreshes, updates, posts, and generic messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ItemEncoder(XmlMsgData msgData)

    • Method Detail

      • encodeItemPost

        public int encodeItemPost(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel channel,
                          ItemInfo itemInfo,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.TransportBuffer msgBuf,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.PostUserInfo postUserInfo,
                          long encodeStartTime)
        Encodes a Post message for an item.
        Parameters:
        channel - - channel to encode post message for.
        itemInfo - - market data item to encode post message for.
        msgBuf - - TransportBuffer to encode post message into.
        postUserInfo -
        encodeStartTime - - if >0, this is a latency timestamp to be included in the post message.
        Returns:
        <0 if encoding fails, 0 otherwise.

      • createItemPost

        public int createItemPost(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel channel,
                          ItemInfo itemInfo,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.PostMsg postMsg,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.Buffer postBuffer,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.PostUserInfo postUserInfo,
                          long encodeStartTime)
        Creates a Post message for an item.
        Parameters:
        channel - - channel to encode post message for.
        itemInfo - - market data item to encode post message for.
        postMsg - - PostMsg to create post message into.
        postBuffer - - buffer for UpdateMsg in encoded data body.
        postUserInfo -
        encodeStartTime - - if >0, this is a latency timestamp to be included in the post message.
        Returns:
        <0 if encoding fails, 0 otherwise.

      • encodeUpdate

        public int encodeUpdate(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel channel,
                        ItemInfo itemInfo,
                        com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.TransportBuffer msgBuf,
                        com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.PostUserInfo postUserInfo,
                        long encodeStartTime,
                        com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Encodes a Update message for an item.
        Parameters:
        channel - - channel to encode update message for.
        itemInfo - - market data item to encode update message for.
        msgBuf - - TransportBuffer to encode update message into.
        postUserInfo -
        encodeStartTime - - if >0, this is a latency timestamp to be included in the update message.
        error - - detailed error information in case of encoding failures.
        Returns:
        <0 if encoding fails, 0 otherwise.

        msgBuf - - TransportBuffer to encode refresh message into.
        postUserInfo -
